title: 148863022.opportunity Management
excerpt: If you act like you have unlimited opportunities, you might give the impression that you have a lot of options.

children.text: If you act like you have unlimited opportunities, you might give the impression that you have a lot of options.
But taking that posture can quickly cause you to squander many of the opportunities that you are given. Because hey, you have so many.
The inverse is to see opportunities for what they are: once in a lifetime occurrences that
Because nothing lasts forever, and all you have is this moment to experience all that you ever will.
